main event: A bright white light was observed moving back and forth over San Bernardino, California on January 27, 1958.
interesting points: The light was described as round and the size of a dime,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,The observed object was noted to move very fast,It was suggested that the light was a new type of anti-collision light being tested,Several aircraft were reported in the area at the time of the sighting.
